item.title: Petracca tips speedy return after Oliver cops fine in court
item.description: Christian Petracca is hopeful of having Clayton Oliver back to full training soon

item.title: Ex Bomber 'in box seat' as race for Pies list spot heats up
item.description: Six players remain in contention to earn a spot on Collingwood's list before the SSP deadline on February 19

item.title: Magpies, Tigers lock in first AFL Charity Shield clash
item.description: Collingwood and Richmond will meet for the inaugural Charity Shield

item.title: 'Maynard rule' confirmed, run-down tackles in focus
item.description: The AFL has confirmed rule changes ahead of the 2024 premiership season

item.title: Mid-season trade period on ice amid rule uncertainty
item.description: The AFL has ruled out a mid-season trade window in 2024, but an introduction in 2025 appears more than likely

item.title: 'Everything's been done': Pies boss defends Murphy call
item.description: Magpies CEO Craig Kelly insists Nathan Murphy is fit to play after a rigorous medical evaluation process

item.title: The power of one: Swans make huge captaincy call
item.description: Sydney has re-shaped its captaincy set-up ahead of the 2024 AFL premiership season

item.title: Tigers make a call on injured star for season opener
item.description: Richmond has outlined its plan for Tom Lynch's return at the start of the season

item.title: Saints utility sidelined for months, recruit weeks away from full fitness
item.description: The Saints will be without Ben Paton for the first couple of months of the season

item.title: Demons star fined for driving while suspended
item.description: Clayton Oliver has pleaded guilty to getting behind the wheel after VicRoads suspended his licence for medical reasons

item.title: Injured Lions recruit on track for early season return
item.description: Tom Doedee could play his first AFL game for Brisbane as early as round three against Collingwood
